name: The Plop Project
description:
At the beginning it was all darkness, until the Big Plop came. 

Now you can reproduce that moment of universal satisfaction at the touch of a button. Well... only if you can get the software working first :-)

The Plop  Project's a simple game which has its origins in  Design and Programming subjects in VII Video Games Development Master at University of Málaga.

All credit and gratitude to Kubbi for his awesome Pathfinder theme.

Attention: Note that part of the gaming experience consists of navigating through Windows Explorer, opening and modifying some files.

Thanks for playing!
